mdRecord.dcterms:title: Preserved lice sample
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ella Thomas Whitten [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Perfume vial containing two lice found on a World War I serviceman, preserved in alcohol by Ella Thomas Whitten, an American nurse who served at Base Hospital No. 43 during World War I.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Biological specimens
